titlestmt.titleproper: Pennsylvania Chapter of the National Society of Daughters of Founders and Patriots of America records 1900-1988
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Pennsylvania Chapter of the National Society of Daughters of Founders and Patriots of America records
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection is comprised mainly of applications for membership to the National Society, from approximately 1900-1971. There are also yearbooks for the Pennsylvania Chapter, 1955-1988 (some gaps), that list members and officers for the local and national organization.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
